ca.uwo.csd.cs2212.team13

Class BestDaysController

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.uwo.csd.cs2212.team13.BestDaysController

  • public class BestDaysController
extends java.lang.Object
    Java Object which passes information from the the BestDaysRecord object to the InterfaceView object.

    BestDaysController contains references to the model object BestDaysRecord, which contains the data for the Best Days page, and the view object InterfaceView, which implements the user interface for all pages.

    The purpose of this class is to pass the data contained in the model BestDaysRecord to the view InterfaceView, so that it can be displayed to the user.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      (package private) class  BestDaysController.clickListener
      Local class accessible only by the BestDaysController object.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private BestDaysRecord model
      Best days record for controller
      private InterfaceView view
      Interface view for controller

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      BestDaysController(BestDaysRecord model, InterfaceView view)
      Constructor, initializes the model and view fields with pointers to BestDaysRecord object and InterfaceView object respectively, and calls method InterfaceView.addClickListenerBestDays(ActionListener) to add a click listener to the Best Days button.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void bestDaysInitialize()
      Sets the Best Days page display fields in InterfaceView with values from the appropriate model Best Days fields.
      void updateBDC(BestDaysRecord model, InterfaceView view)
      Updater, initializes the model and view fields with pointers to BestDaysRecord object and InterfaceView object respectively

    • Constructor Detail

      • BestDaysController

        public BestDaysController(BestDaysRecord model,
                          InterfaceView view)
        Constructor, initializes the model and view fields with pointers to BestDaysRecord object and InterfaceView object respectively, and calls method InterfaceView.addClickListenerBestDays(ActionListener) to add a click listener to the Best Days button.
        Parameters:
        model - the BestDaysRecord model containing the Best Days data to be displayed
        view - the InterfaceView view containing the user interface implementation
        See Also:
        InterfaceView.addClickListenerBestDays(ActionListener)
